resources.string: "Add Project Page: \tYou will see the app using your camera. You can simply take pictures by clicking on the circle button. Then you will see your taken picture on bottom of your screen. \tIf you are done with your project or you want to delete some pictures, simply click on \"DONE\" and it will lead you to a new page where you will see your taken pictures. \t Editing Project Page: \tTo delete a picture, click on the picture you want to delete and then click on the \"Delete\" button located on the bottom left of your device. \tYou can access your deleted pictures by clicking on the \"Recycle\" button located on the top right of your screen. You will see all your deleted pictures on this page. \tTo finalize your project click on \"Create Movie\" button. You will see your photos as a movie. Create Project Page: \tTo change the speed of your project, there is a speed bar located on the bottom right of your device. Drag the circle icon towards \"turtle\" to slow down or \"rabbit\" to go faster. \tTo save your project, click on \"DONE\" and it will lead you to your projects page. "
